1565360.name: RPG Maker MV - Legends of Russia - Winter Village Tiles
1565360.description:
Explore the icy and snow-draped North with these rural Russia themed tiles.

The 5th tileset in my Fantasy themed series, this RPG Maker MV/MZ compatible asset pack contains retro pixel art tiles to allow the creation of villages within a frozen tundra. Modular izba (house) tiles and cabins allow for a respite from the cold while the terrain tiles allow for expansive fields, hillsides and glaciers. All tiles are base size 48x48.

This tileset comes with:

- Tilemaps and autotile compatible with RPGMaker MV/MZ
- Tutorials on how to use the tiles in RPGMaker MV/MZ (including example project files with tile collision for MV/MZ).
- 726 (48x48) snowy village and terrain themed tiles in png format
- Animated doors and an animated fishing hole for use with the ice tiles.
- Modular wooden and log building tiles, windows with several decorative trims, chimneys, lamp posts, signs, railings, storage sheds, and stilted platforms.
- Snow, dirt, dead grass, ice, rocky hills, birch trees, pine tree, tree stumps, fences and a gate and more...

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1565360.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
